ai-patthana15.2:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.2:2.1_0: No to cause the pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana15.2:3.1_0: There is no principle for the sake of pleasant feeling ...
ai-patthana15.2:4.1_0: Three on the cause, supported by three, three, four, five, six, or three.
ai-patthana15.2:5.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana15.2:6.1_0: There is no principle for the sake of painful feeling ...
ai-patthana15.2:7.1_0: (These three discourses should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana15.2:8.1_0: There is no such thing as neutral, but doesn’t lead to pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana15.2:9.1_0: (These three discourses should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
